page.title: 18A day in the life of a child
page.content: 8-00am I get up,get dressed and have breakfast.8-20am I get all my books together and put them in my school bag 8-30am Dad takes my sister and me to school.8-40am I am in school and wait for my friend Rhian to arrive.9-15am The bell rings and we enter school.9-20am Today we have mathematics.10-40am we have playtime.11-00am We have Welsh.11-30am We have English.12-00 We have lunch.12-40pm We finish lunch and go out to play.1-15pm The bell rings and we go in for Nature and Science.2-25pm We have playtime.2-45pm We have Physical Education.3-40pm We go home. 3-50pm I am at home and I watch television.5-15pm I have my tea.6-00pm I go out to play.7-00pm I come in and watch television.9-00pm I have a piece of toast and a cup of tea. 9-20pm I wash and go to bed.
